3.4.name: wordpress/opengraph-and-microdata-generator
3.4.description:
A lightweight plugin to add Facebook Opengraph in the section of your blog. The Facebook Opengraph lets yor visitors share your content with proper Title, Description and Thumbnail Image.

  • The Post Title as OpenGraph Title

  • The first image uploaded/found in the post as the Facebook thumbnail. Ability to define default thumbnail if no image is found on the post.

  • Custom Excerpt for the Facebook Share/Like description. Brings the first 25 words of the blog post if no custom excerpt is found.

  • The Post URL as the Facebook Share/Like URL. Doesn't matter if you have pretty permalinks on.

Here is a live demo on my WordPress Opengraph Plugin Homepage. If you find my plugins useful, add me in your circles on Google +. Don't forget to check my blog
